actions.subcommittee: Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials

official_title: A bill to amend section 7227 of title 10, United States Code, to provide for the furnishing of routine port services at no cost to naval vessels of a friendly foreign country when, by agreement or custom, such services are provided reciprocally to visiting naval vessels of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to furnish routine port services at no cost to naval vessels of a friendly country when such services are provided reciprocally to visiting U.S. naval vessels. Requires such services to be furnished through working-capital funds of the Department of Defense and reimbursed by any operating funds available to the Navy.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 7227 of title 10, United States Code, to provide for the furnishing of routine port services at no cost to naval vessels of a friendly foreign country when, by agreement or custom, such services are provided reciprocally to visiting naval vessels of the United States.
